form_title.ms_form_title_llm_v1: Application to Register Permanent Residence or Adjust Status, I-485

full_text: Screened by NARA, 8/11/2023 U.S. Department of Justic OMB No. 1115-0053 Immigration and Naturalization Service Application to Register Permanent Residence or Adjust Status START HERE - Please Type or Print FOR INS USE ONLY Returned Part 1.
